name: Spicy Miso Ramen
description: A rich, flavorful broth with chewy noodles, topped with spicy minced pork, soft-boiled egg, and green onions.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Roasted chunks of chicken in a creamy, spiced tomato sauce, served with basmati rice.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Thinly sliced marinated pork with pineapple, onions, and cilantro on small corn tortillas.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy grilled beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and pickles on a toasted brioche bun.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of fresh nigiri and maki rolls, served with ginger and wasabi.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel balls with hummus, tahini, and fresh vegetables wrapped in pita bread.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender strips of beef and mushrooms in a creamy sour cream sauce, served over egg noodles.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded and fried eggplant slices layered with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

name: Bibimbap
description: A bowl of rice topped with sautéed vegetables, beef, a fried egg, and spicy gochujang sauce.

name: Lamb Gyro
description: Seasoned lamb slices with tomato, onion, and tzatziki sauce in a warm pita.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered white fish served with chunky fries and tartar sauce.

name: Peking Duck
description: Crispy roasted duck served with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and scallions.

name: Paella Mixta
description: Saffron rice cooked with seafood, chicken, and chorizo.

name: Pho Bo
description: A fragrant beef noodle soup with herbs, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Coq au Vin
description: Chicken braised with red wine, mushrooms, and pearl onions.

name: Goulash
description: A hearty stew of beef and vegetables, seasoned with paprika.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in a mild, creamy tomato sauce with plenty of butter.

name: Enchiladas Verdes
description: Corn tortillas filled with chicken and topped with a tangy green tomatillo sauce and cheese.

name: Chicken Schnitzel
description: Breaded and fried chicken breast, typically served with potato salad.

name: Laksa
description: A spicy noodle soup with a coconut milk base, shrimp, and tofu puffs.

name: Osso Buco
description: Cross-cut veal shanks braised with vegetables, white wine, and broth.

name: Shepherd's Pie
description: Minced lamb and vegetables topped with mashed potatoes and baked.

name: Dim Sum Selection
description: A variety of small steamed or fried dumplings and buns.

name: Moussaka
description: Layered eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce, baked to perfection.

name: Tom Yum Goong
description: Spicy and sour soup with shrimp, lemongrass, and galangal.

name: Steak Frites
description: Grilled steak served with a side of crispy french fries and herb butter.

name: Ceviche
description: Fresh raw fish cured in citrus juices, spiced with chili peppers and onions.

name: Ratatouille
description: A stewed vegetable dish consisting of eggplant, zucchini, peppers, and tomatoes.

name: Bangers and Mash
description: Sausages served with mashed potatoes and onion gravy.

name: Bulgogi
description: Thin, marinated slices of beef grilled on a barbecue or stir-fried.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp sautéed in a garlic, butter, and white wine sauce, served over linguine.

name: Arepas with Carne Mechada
description: Cornmeal cakes stuffed with shredded beef, beans, and cheese.

name: Köttbullar (Swedish Meatballs)
description: Meatballs served with creamy gravy, lingonberry jam, and mashed potatoes.

name: Massaman Curry
description: A rich, relatively mild Thai curry with peanuts, potatoes, and beef.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Satay
description: Grilled chicken skewers served with a spicy peanut sauce.

name: Chili con Carne
description: A spicy stew containing chili peppers, meat, and often tomatoes and beans.

name: Gyoza
description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with ground meat and vegetables.

name: Hummus Plate
description: Creamy hummus served with olives, feta, cucumbers, and warm pita bread.

name: Quiche Lorraine
description: A savory open-faced pastry crust filled with cheese, meat, and seafood or vegetables.

name: Lobster Roll
description: Chilled lobster meat mixed with mayo, served in a toasted bun.

name: Jambalaya
description: A Creole rice dish with chicken, andouille sausage, and shrimp.

name: Chicken Adobo
description: Chicken marinated and simmered in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and peppercorns.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty and healthy soup made with brown or red lentils and vegetables.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
description: Creamy chicken and vegetable filling in a flaky pastry crust.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pork shredded and tossed in BBQ sauce, served on a bun.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer cheese cubes grilled with bell peppers and onions.

name: Ravioli with Sage Butter
description: Cheese-filled ravioli tossed in a simple sauce of browned butter and fresh sage.

name: Clam Chowder
description: A thick soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, and cream.

name: Tabbouleh Salad
description: Finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, onion, and bulgur, seasoned with olive oil and lemon.

name: Beef Wellington
description: Fillet steak coated with pâté and mushroom duxelles, wrapped in puff pastry and baked.

name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: A spicy stew made with kimchi, pork belly, and tofu.

name: Banh Mi
description: A crusty baguette filled with pickled vegetables, cilantro, chili, and various meats.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick and easy stir-fried rice with eggs, peas, carrots, and soy sauce.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
description: Tortilla filled with cheese and grilled chicken, served with salsa and sour cream.

name: Minestrone Soup
description: A thick vegetable soup often with the addition of pasta or rice.

name: Lamb Rogan Josh
description: A flavorful lamb curry with a deep red color from Kashmiri chilies.

name: Cottage Pie
description: Minced beef and vegetables topped with mashed potatoes and baked.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: Layered pasta with rich meat sauce, béchamel, and parmesan cheese.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Pasta tossed with parmesan cheese and butter.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Pork ribs slow-cooked and glazed with a smoky barbecue sauce.

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Grilled chicken with peppers and onions, served with tortillas and toppings.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Grilled salmon glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef in crispy or soft tortillas with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Clams Linguine
description: Pasta with fresh clams, garlic, white wine, and parsley.

name: Vegetable Stir-fry
description: Assorted fresh vegetables quickly cooked in a wok with a savory sauce.

name: Lamb Kofte
description: Spiced ground lamb skewers grilled and served with flatbread.

name: Chicken Katsu Curry
description: Breaded chicken cutlet served with a thick, mild curry sauce and rice.

name: Pork Souvlaki
description: Grilled skewers of marinated pork, often served in a pita with tzatziki.

name: Shrimp Gumbo
description: A thick stew with shrimp, okra, and the 'holy trinity' of vegetables.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy rice dish cooked with broth and plenty of sautéed mushrooms.

name: Beef Pho
description: Noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and beef.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple salad made of sliced fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and sweet basil.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Deep-fried chicken wings coated in a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce.

name: Duck Confit
description: Duck legs slow-cooked in their own fat until tender, then crisped.

name: Zucchini Fritters
description: Grated zucchini mixed with flour, eggs, and herbs, then pan-fried.

name: Chicken Piccata
description: Chicken breast sautéed in a lemon, butter, and caper sauce.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: A vegetarian dish made with potatoes, cauliflower, and Indian spices.

name: Sloppy Joes
description: Ground beef seasoned with onions, tomato sauce or ketchup, and other seasonings, served on a burger bun.

name: Bibimbap
description: Mixed rice with vegetables, beef, and a whole lot of flavor.

name: Beef Carpaccio
description: Thinly sliced raw beef served as an appetizer.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers filled with a mixture of meat, rice, and vegetables, then baked.

name: Chana Masala
description: Chickpeas simmered in a spicy and tangy tomato-based sauce.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Grilled or fried fish in corn tortillas with cabbage slaw and lime.

name: Lentil Dahl
description: Creamy lentils cooked with spices, ginger, and garlic.

name: Steak Diane
description: Pan-fried steak with a sauce made from the pan juices.

name: Gnocchi with Pesto
description: Soft potato dumplings tossed in a fresh basil pesto sauce.

name: Chicken Marsala
description: Chicken braised with Marsala wine and mushrooms.

name: Beef Stew
description: Slow-cooked beef with potatoes, carrots, and onions in a rich gravy.

name: Spanakopita
description: Savory spinach and feta pie wrapped in flaky phyllo dough.

name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
description: Spicy tomato-based soup with chicken, topped with tortilla strips and avocado.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional soup made from dashi stock and softened miso paste.

name: Eggplant Moussaka
description: A classic Greek dish with layers of eggplant and a rich meat sauce.

name: Prawn Linguine
description: Pasta with succulent prawns, garlic, chili, and lemon.

name: Chicken Kiev
description: Chicken breast rolled around cold butter, then coated with eggs and breadcrumbs, and fried.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
description: Crispy pork chunks tossed in a tangy sweet and sour sauce with pineapple and peppers.

name: Cobb Salad
description: Main-dish garden salad made with chopped salad greens, tomato, crisp bacon, boiled chicken breast, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, chives, Roquefort cheese, and red wine vinaigrette.

name: Ramen (Shoyu)
description: Noodles in a soy sauce based broth, typically topped with bamboo shoots, nori, and pork.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Tube-shaped pasta baked with tomato sauce and three kinds of cheese.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then roasted in a clay oven.

name: Beef Brisket
description: Slow-smoked beef brisket, tender and flavorful.

name: Omelette with Herbs
description: A simple, fluffy omelette filled with fresh herbs.

name: Falafel Platter
description: Falafel served with hummus, pita, and a side of salad.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Pieces of chicken marinated in spices and yogurt, then grilled.

name: Poke Bowl
description: Diced raw fish served over rice with various toppings like seaweed and avocado.

name: Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup
description: Classic comfort food featuring a toasted cheese sandwich and creamy tomato soup.
